title: Pizza Express - Highcross
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Chain pizzeria restaurant, willing to cater to vegetarians and vegans. Could make cheese-less pizza or add vegan cheese if you bring it. The Pianta pizza is vegan suitable, comes with spinach, chestnut mushroom, pine kernels, artichoke, tomato, chilli flakes and garlic, topped with olive oil and fresh parsley. Has sorbet for dessert.
